properties.description: Sample pipeline that uses data flow to partition output based on incoming source file size

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	PrimaryKey as string ('ID'),
	Columns as string ('Player,Team,Salary')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GenericInput
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDimensionTable
AddHashInput, AddHashExisting exists(AddHashInput@id_hash == AddHashExisting@id_hash
	&& AddHashInput@columns_hash == AddHashExisting@columns_hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewAndUpdatedRows
GenericInput derive(id_hash = md5(byName($PrimaryKey)),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashInput
FilterForActive derive(id_hash = md5(byNames(split($PrimaryKey,','))),
		columns_hash = md5(byNames(split($Columns,',')))) ~> AddHashExisting
AddHashExisting aggregate(MaxSurrogateKey = max(toInteger(byName('Key')))) ~> GetMaxSurrogateKey
NewAndUpdatedRows keyGenerate(output(Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddKey
AddKey, GetMaxSurrogateKey join(Key == MaxSurrogateKey || true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey
JoinWithMaxSurrogateKey derive(Key = Key + MaxSurrogateKey,
		Active = 1,
		ActiveStartTime = currentUTC(),
		ActiveEndTime = toTimestamp(toString(null()))) ~> AddDimensionColumns
AddHashExisting, NewAndUpdatedRows exists(AddHashExisting@id_hash == AddHashInput@id_hash,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FilterForUpdatedValues
FilterForUpdatedValues derive(Active = 0,
		ActiveEndTime = currentUTC()) ~> UpdateObsolete
AddDimensionColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColsInput
MarkAsInsert, DropUnwantedColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionAllData
UpdateObsolete alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> MarkAsUpdate
MarkAsUpdate select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','columns_hash','MaxSurrogateKey'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DropUnwantedColumns
DropUnwantedColsInput alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> MarkAsInsert
ExistingDimensionTable filter(toInteger(byName('Active')) == 1) ~> FilterForActive
UnionAllData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:[($PrimaryKey)],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DimensionTableSink

sources.name: loans
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> loans

sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(input(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as double,
		delinq_2yrs as double,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as double,
		mths_since_last_delinq as double,
		mths_since_last_record as double,
		open_acc as double,
		pub_rec as double,
		revol_bal as double,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as boolean,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as double,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as double,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared loans = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/loan.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = loans,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [term] = " 36 months"),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Filtered rows", {{"id", Int64.Type}, {"member_id", Int64.Type}, {"loan_amnt", Int64.Type}, {"funded_amnt", Int64.Type}, {"funded_amnt_inv", Int64.Type}, {"term", type text}, {"int_rate", type number}, {"installment", type number}, {"grade", type text}, {"sub_grade", type text}, {"emp_title", type text}, {"emp_length", type text}, {"home_ownership", type text}, {"annual_inc", type number}, {"verification_status", type text}, {"issue_d", type date}, {"loan_status", type text}, {"pymnt_plan", type text}, {"url", type text}, {"desc", type text}, {"purpose", type text}, {"title", type text}, {"zip_code", type text}, {"addr_state", type text}, {"dti", type number}, {"delinq_2yrs", Int64.Type}, {"earliest_cr_line", type date}, {"inq_last_6mths", Int64.Type}, {"mths_since_last_delinq", Int64.Type}, {"mths_since_last_record", Int64.Type}, {"open_acc", Int64.Type}, {"pub_rec", Int64.Type}, {"revol_bal", Int64.Type}, {"revol_util", type number}, {"total_acc", Int64.Type}, {"initial_list_status", type text}, {"out_prncp", Int64.Type}, {"out_prncp_inv", Int64.Type}, {"total_pymnt", type number}, {"total_pymnt_inv", type number}, {"total_rec_prncp", type number}, {"total_rec_int", type number}, {"total_rec_late_fee", type number}, {"recoveries", type number}, {"collection_recovery_fee", type number}, {"last_pymnt_d", type date}, {"last_pymnt_amnt", type number}, {"next_pymnt_d", type text}, {"last_credit_pull_d", type date}, {"collections_12_mths_ex_med", Int64.Type}, {"mths_since_last_major_derog", type text}, {"policy_code", Int64.Type}, {"application_type", type text}, {"annual_inc_joint", type text}, {"dti_joint", type text}, {"verification_status_joint", type text}, {"acc_now_delinq", Int64.Type}, {"tot_coll_amt", type text}, {"tot_cur_bal", type text}, {"open_acc_6m", type text}, {"open_il_6m", type text}, {"open_il_12m", type text}, {"open_il_24m", type text}, {"mths_since_rcnt_il", type text}, {"total_bal_il", type text}, {"il_util", type text}, {"open_rv_12m", type text}, {"open_rv_24m", type text}, {"max_bal_bc", type text}, {"all_util", type text}, {"total_rev_hi_lim", type text}, {"inq_fi", type text}, {"total_cu_tl", type text}, {"inq_last_12m", type text}}),
  #"Uppercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"verification_status", each Text.Upper(_), type text}, {"loan_status", each Text.Upper(_), type text}})
in
  #"Uppercased text";

		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,

	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

		mths_since_last_delinq as short,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as short,
		pub_rec as boolean,
		revol_bal as short,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as short,
		initial_list_status as boolean,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as boolean,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as boolean,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as boolean,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 aggregate(groupBy(mycols = sha2(256,columns())),
	each(match(true()), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRows
source2, DistinctRows join(source2@id == DistinctRows@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
DistinctRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DistinctRows sink(input(
		id as integer,

		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as boolean,

		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as double,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as double,

		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,

		open_il_24m as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	format: 'table',

		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

		total_cu_tl as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 derive(member_id = toInteger(null()),
		emp_title = sha2(256,emp_title,'mysalt'),
		column1 = 1,
		local1 := 'abc',
		local2 := '123') ~> MaskingPII
Lookup1 split(instr(term,'36') != 0,
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Terms@(term36, otherTerm)
MaskingPII, Aggregate1 lookup(column1 == aggkey,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
source2 aggregate(funded_amnt_stddev = round(stddev(funded_amnt),2),
		funded_amnt_avg = round(avg(funded_amnt),2),
		rowcounts = count(1),
		aggkey = max(1)) ~> Aggregate1
Terms@term36 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['term36.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> sink1
Terms@otherTerm sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['terms.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3) ~> sink2
Aggregate1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> lookupSink

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionColumn: 'ProductID',
	partitionBy('external', 4)) ~> SQLProds
SQLProds select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PruneCols
PruneCols derive(product = @(name=Name,
		color=Color),
		margin = ['cost'->StandardCost,'price'->ListPrice],
		deconstructedName = split(Name,' ')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['moviemap1.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	filename as string ('SampleData/moviesDB.csv'),
	columns as string ('movie,title'),
	dbname as string ('products')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 1,
	wildcardPaths:[($filename)]) ~> source1
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DBSource
LabelSource2 split(isNull(byName('ProductID')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(badSchema, goodSchema)
LabelSource split(isNull(columnNames()[8]),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(badColCount, goodColCount)
ConditionalSplit2@goodColCount derive(MovieID = toInteger(byName('movie')),
		MovieTitle = byName('title'),
		MovieYearReleased = toInteger(byName('year')),
		MovieRating = toInteger(byName('Rating')),
		MovieGenres = split(toString(byName('genres')),'|')) ~> BuildModel
ConditionalSplit2@badColCount, ConditionalSplit1@badSchema union(byName: true)~> GroupBadSources
BuildModel, ConditionalSplit1@goodSchema union(byName: true)~> GroupGoodSources
source1 derive(sourcename = $filename,
		ruleName = 'Column Count') ~> LabelSource
DBSource derive(sourcename = $dbname,
		ruleName = 'ID Check') ~> LabelSource2
GroupBadSources derive(results = 'bad') ~> SetAsBad
GroupGoodSources derive(results = 'good') ~> SetAsGood
SetAsBad, SetAsGood union(byName: true)~> GroupAll
GroupAll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['metachecker.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		sourcename,
		ruleName,
		results
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WriteResults

source(output(
		ProductDescriptionID as integer,
		Description as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		json_value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source8
Filter1 parse(levelandregistration = json_value ? (level as string,
		registration as long),
	format: 'xml',
	namespaces: true) ~> ParseJSON
source8 filter(ProductDescriptionID == 3) ~> Filter1
ParseJSON parse(newdesc = Description ? (desc1 as string, desc2 as string, desc3 as string),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	nullValue: '') ~> ParseCSV
ParseCSV sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

UserQuery.name: SinkAzureSqlTableLoans
UserQuery.script:
sink(input(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkAzureSqlTableLoans

UserQuery.name: folderout
UserQuery.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> folderout
